content: The names of several results about Complex.abs collide with results in the root namespace when the namespace Complex is opened. This could be quite an inconvenience. To avoid this, this PR protects the name of these results.
(I found about 50 places in the code where _root_. can now be removed thanks to this change. Shall I push this cleanup to your PR branch?)
Yes, please! (I was planning to do that eventually but I wanted to make sure everybody was happy with the change first).

You might find people are more likely to be happy with the change if the PR demonstrates the (many) places where the change makes other code nicer, not just the (few) places where it makes it less nice :smile:
